participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: He is laid-back and enjoys hands-on activities. He loves spending time outdoors and values loyalty and companionship.
participant_1.background: i have two dogs. i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i own two vintage mustangs.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: She is curious and playful, with a vivid imagination. She enjoys storytelling and loves to explore the world around her.
participant_2.background: my best friend lives next door. i've a pet turtle. i don't pick up my toys. i like to play with my dolls. i am four.
